name: Vasilis Maras
story: Vasilis Maras grew up in Athens, Greece. He was always interested in science and technology, and pursued a degree in computer engineering at the National Technical University of Athens. He now works as a software engineer in Athens, but his real passion is exploring new technologies and programming languages in his free time. Vasilis is quite introverted, and prefers spending his evenings coding or reading about new advancements in his field. He is still searching for the perfect project to really challenge him and push his skills to the limit.
